entry.question: When do I use this ability?
entry.answer: You use it before the game begins. After you put the Medic! into your hand, you’ll shuffle the rest of your deck. Then you’ll draw the normal 3 cards at the start of the game. This means you’ll start the game with 4 cards in hand (Medic! plus the 3 you draw). You’ll still draw a card at the start of your first turn.

entry.question: If I move damage counters from one of my characters to another character, will Specialist Ratchet’s ability trigger?
entry.answer: No. Moving damage counters is different than repairing.

entry.question: If you play Salvage for Parts while Specialist Ratchet is in bot mode, and you scrap, say, 2 opponent upgrades along with yours do you get to use the repair for the opponents scrapped upgrades as attack for Ratchet?
entry.answer: For Salvage for Parts, you’re doing all of the repairing, so Ratchet’s ability will trigger that many times. In this scenario, that would give Ratchet +4 Attack.

entry.question: For Wave 3 Ratchet, Ultra Magnus, Trailbreaker and Wheeljack. Do you search for their related card before you draw starting hand or after?
entry.answer: Before the game starts, find their related card, shuffle, then draw three cards for your opening hand.
